channel.title: Server Help?
channel.description:
Error: Unable to connect to MySQL server. MySQL reported: Access denied for user 'root'@'localhost' (using password: NO).
Im really tired right now and my heads not working... How can I fix this? I fixed this before but Im really out of it. :confused:
msn: Crazyonedude@hotmail.com

item.title: Server Help?
item.dc:creator: @_Kyle ~Kyle
item.description:
@_Kyle wrote:

Sir Meth:

Error: Unable to connect to MySQL server. MySQL reported: Access denied for user ‘root’@‘localhost’ (using password: NO).

Check your Conf.xml
